早く: (hayaku) - cedo; em breve; rapidamente; velozmente; rápido
早くから: (はやくから) - early on; earlier on; from early
早くとも: (はやくとも) - (ant: 遅くとも) at the earliest
早くも: (はやくも) - already; as early as
早く言えば: (はやくいえば) - in a word; to put it briefly; to make a long story short
早ければ早いほどいい: (はやければはやいほどいい) - the sooner, the better
早ければ早いほど良い: (はやければはやいほどいい) - the sooner, the better
早ければ早い程良い: (はやければはやいほどいい) - the sooner, the better
早さ: (はやさ) - (esp. 速さ) speed/velocity/quickness/rapidity; (esp. 早さ) earliness
早すぎる: (はやすぎる) - premature; untimely (e.g. death); early
早とちり: (はやとちり) - jumping to a wrong conclusion
早まき: (はやまき) - (ant: 遅蒔き・おそまき・1) sowing early
早まる: (はやまる) - to move ahead (three hours, etc.)/to move up; to quicken/to speed up/to gather speed; (esp. 早まる) to be hasty/to be rash
早め: (はやめ) - (esp. 早め) early; (esp. 速め) (ant: 遅め・2) fast
早めに: (はやめに) - earlier than usual; ahead of time; in good season
早める: (はやめる) - to hasten; to quicken; to expedite; to precipitate; to accelerate
早め薬: (はやめぐすり) - drugs to stimulate childbirth
早ゆで: (はやゆで) - quick cook (e.g. pasta); quick boil
早わかり: (はやわかり) - quick learner/quick understanding/easy to understand; handbook/guidebook
早世: (そうせい) - dying young; early death
早乙女: (saotome) - jovem plantadora de arroz, menina jovem
早分かり: (はやわかり) - quick learner/quick understanding/easy to understand; handbook/guidebook
早割: (はやわり) - discount for early booking
早合点: (はやがてん) - jumping to a hasty conclusion
早咲: (はやざき) - early blooming; early flowering
早咲き: (はやざき) - early blooming; early flowering
早回し: (はやまわし) - spinning rapidly; turning quickly; fast-forward (VCR, etc.); scanning
早場米: (はやばまい) - rice from an early harvest; early rice
早婚: (そうこん) - early marriage; marrying young
早寝早起き: (はやねはやおき) - early to bed early to rise
早射ち: (はやうち) - quick shooting; quick shot; fast draw
早少女: (さおとめ) - young female rice planter; young girl
早尚: (そうしょう) - (incorrect variant of 尚早)  prematurity
早弁: (はやべん) - eating one's bento before lunchtime (e.g. of a student)
早引き: (はやびき) - leaving work (office, school) early
早引け: (はやびけ) - leaving work (office, school) early
早御飯: (はやごはん) - eating early; early meal
早急: (そうきゅう) - immediate; prompt; quick; rapid; urgent; pressing
早成: (そうせい) - early completion; maturing early; precocious
早手: (はやて) - gale; strong wind; swift wind; fresh breeze (Beaufort scale)
早打ち: (はやうち) - fast typing; fast beating/fast drumming
早指し: (はやざし) - quick game of shogi
早指しチェス: (はやざしチェス) - speed chess; blitz chess
早撃ち: (はやうち) - quick shot; quick draw
早早: (はやはや) - (used as an imperative) quickly
早春賦: (そうしゅんふ) - Ode to Early Spring
早晩: (そうばん) - sooner or later; eventually
早朝の着: (そうちょうのちゃく) - early-morning arrival

早期締結: (そうきていけつ) - prompt conclusion; early conclusion
早期老化症: (そうきろうかしょう) - progeria (disease characterized by symptoms suggestive of premature aging)
早期解散: (そうきかいさん) - early dissolution (parliament, diet, etc.)

早期警戒管制機: (そうきけいかいかんせいき) - airborne early-warning system; AWACS

早期退職制度: (そうきたいしょくせいど) - early retirement program; early retirement programme

早桶: (はやおけ) - roughly made casket; quickly made casket
早死に: (はやじに) - premature death; untimely death; dying young
早熟: (そうじゅく) - precocity; early ripening; premature development
早生: (わせ) - (usu. 早稲) early ripening rice; (usu. 早生) early-ripening fruit (grain, etc.); (usu. 早生) person who becomes physically or mentally mature at an early age
早生まれ: (はやうまれ) - born between January 1st and April 1st
